============
Installation
============

Requirements
------------
First make sure, that you have installed Python 2.7.
Over that, Hotcat requires some additional packages:

- pymongo
- requests
- tornado
- tld
- lxml

if you are using a package manager like pip or easy_install, just run::

    $ pip install pymongo requests tornado tld lxml

or::

    $ easy_install pymongo requests tornado tld lxml


Getting Hotcat
--------------
Now getting Hotcat::

    $ git clone https://github.com/hft-swp2-ws1516/crawler.git
    $ cd crawler
    $ python hotcat.py


For details see :doc:`USAGE`.
